author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This PR brings stage-2 unpacking up to date.  It adds stage-2 unpackers to standard sequence, but these should do nothing when their RAW payloads are not present.

Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_6_X #11866 (original by @cms-l1t-offline).
title: udpates to stage2 unpacking
